list-item.label: a)
list-item.p: Pneumatic systems shall be designed and installed in accordance with ISO 4414.

list-item.label: b)
list-item.p: Compressors shall either be designed to operate on a lubricant which is resistant against carbonization (e.g. synthetic oils), or fitted with temperature monitoring systems and a manual or automatic shutdown systems.

list-item.label: c)
list-item.p: A filter shall be incorporated in every compressor air intake system to prevent the ingress of foreign material.

list-item.label: d)
list-item.p: On a pneumatically powered rig, a main line valve shall be provided on the rig.

list-item.label: e)
list-item.p: Simple pressure vessels shall be designed and tested in accordance with ISO 4414, ISO 16528-1 and ISO 16528-2.
